memtest.title: Memtest+
memtest.description: MemTest86 is the original self booting memory testing software for x86 and ARM computers. Supporting both BIOS and UEFI
memtest.author: tftp-np

calculator.title: Calculator+
calculator.description: Modern electronic calculators vary from cheap, give-away, credit-card-sized models to sturdy desktop models with built-in printers. They became popular in the mid-1970s as the incorporation of integrated circuits reduced their size and cost. By the end of that decade, prices had dropped to the point where a basic calculator was affordable to most and they became common in schools.
calculator.author: tftp-np

paint.title: Paint+
paint.description: Paint is a liquid pigment that, after applied to a solid material and allowed to dry, adds a film-like layer, in most cases to create an image, known as a painting. Paint can be made in many colors and types. Most paints are either oil-based or water-based, and each has distinct characteristics.
paint.author: tftp-np
